etymology.description: 忄(忄) (xīn, "heart") + 夬(夬) (guài, "decisive") = semantic element of heart + phonetic element suggesting sound -> fast
etymology.interpretation: The character combines 忄(忄), the radical for matters related to emotions or states of mind, with the phonetic 夬(夬), hinting at decisiveness and speed, thus meaning "fast" or "rapid."

examples.chinese: 他跑得很快(他跑得很快)。
他答题快(他答題快)，老师夸奖他(老師誇獎他)。
examples.pinyin: Tā dá tí kuài, lǎoshī kuā jiǎng tā.
examples.english: He answers the questions quickly, and the teacher praises him.
